prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered nurturing pose with arms open in welcoming embrace, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth. Hair or geometric crystalline appendages incorporating Flower of Life, Platonic solids, Merkaba patterns from sacred geometry symbolism. Outfit is unique: neutral grey and neutral grey structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding, elaborate with shifting Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns and Seed of Life emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like rose of victory with seven-fold geometric petals with elemental spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor SOAGEEL's profile: 'He who helps the most', Aethyr NIA, Earth element, Tarot The Empress, Sephirot Netzach, Zodiac Taurus, embodying the essence: 'As SOAGEEL approaches, a comforting warmth enfolds the space generosity and support flow freely, urg...' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered nurturing pose with arms open in welcoming embrace
visual_elements.head_shape: large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with crystal-like facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth

outfit.base: structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding
outfit.details: Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns
outfit.magical_essence: crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles

visual_elements.accessory: rose of victory with seven-fold geometric petals
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who helps the most'
profile_data.essence: As SOAGEEL approaches, a comforting warmth enfolds the space generosity and support flow freely, urging everyone to give and care for one another.
profile_data.angelic_role: Angel of Fount of Benevolence; guides granite-hewn hosts.
profile_data.form_description: A living geometric form emerging from bedrock, representing Earth's fundamental structure and SOAGEEL's protective essence. Translucent granite-like crystalline body with fractal edges suggesting infinite generative potential.
profile_data.color_reasoning: Emerald connects to Netzach's fertility and Earth's generative power. Bronze represents divine strength and protective metallic resonance. Shifting pattern symbolizes compassion's fluid nature.
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometries represent cosmic harmonization, structural integrity, and transformative potential inherent in Earth element
